ch.aplu.android

Class GGOrientationSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.android.GGOrientationSensor

  • public class GGOrientationSensor
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton abstraction of the hardware orientation sensor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAzimuth()
      Returns the current azimuth adapted to the current device orientation (compass line bottom to top, positive clockwise).
      int getDeviceAzimuth()
      Returns the current pitch in a coordinate system fixed to the device (independent of the device orientation).
      int getDevicePitch()
      Returns the current pitch in a coordinate system fixed to the device (independent of the device orientation).
      int getDeviceRoll()
      Returns the current rool in a coordinate system fixed to the device (independent of the device orientation).
      int getPitch()
      Returns the current pitch (forward tilt angle) adapted to the current device orientation.
      int getRoll()
      Returns the current roll (left tilt angle) adapted to the current device orientation.
      static GGOrientationSensor init(android.app.Activity activity)
      Initializes the orientation sensor for the given activity and returns a GGOrientationSensor reference for the given activity.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static GGOrientationSensor init(android.app.Activity activity)
        Initializes the orientation sensor for the given activity and returns a GGOrientationSensor reference for the given activity. If the oriententation sensor was enabled before, releases the old resources.
        Returns:
        a GGOrientationSensor reference to get access to polling methods

      • getAzimuth

        public int getAzimuth()
        Returns the current azimuth adapted to the current device orientation (compass line bottom to top, positive clockwise).
        Returns:
        the mesured azimuth (in degrees 0..360)

      • getPitch

        public int getPitch()
        Returns the current pitch (forward tilt angle) adapted to the current device orientation.
        Returns:
        the mesured pitch angle (in degrees)

      • getRoll

        public int getRoll()
        Returns the current roll (left tilt angle) adapted to the current device orientation.
        Returns:
        the mesured roll angle (in degrees)

      • getDeviceAzimuth

        public int getDeviceAzimuth()
        Returns the current pitch in a coordinate system fixed to the device (independent of the device orientation).
        Returns:
        the mesured device coordinate pitch angle (in degrees)

      • getDevicePitch

        public int getDevicePitch()
        Returns the current pitch in a coordinate system fixed to the device (independent of the device orientation).
        Returns:
        the mesured device coordinate pitch angle (in degrees)

      • getDeviceRoll

        public int getDeviceRoll()
        Returns the current rool in a coordinate system fixed to the device (independent of the device orientation).
        Returns:
        the mesured device coordinate roll angle (in degrees)
